name: Stress Breathing
description: Habitual stress-driven breathing patterns that hinder the development of calm.

name: Physical Restlessness
description: Restless bodily sensations and inability to settle physically during meditation.

name: Mental Restlessness
description: Agitated, busy mind that resists relaxation and stillness.

name: Sleepiness & Dullness
description: Over-relaxation causing the mind to slip into a sleepy, drifty state.

name: Habitual Forgetting
description: Repeatedly losing awareness and becoming absorbed in thought without noticing.

name: Habitual Control
description: Unconscious tendency to control the breath rather than allowing it to flow naturally.

name: Mind Wandering
description: Mind drifting to sticky thoughts, memories, or fantasies during meditation.

name: Gross Dullness
description: Noticeable loss of clarity and sharpness of awareness during meditation.

name: Subtle Dullness
description: Barely perceptible loss of clarity; awareness present but lacking vividness.

name: Subtle Wandering
description: Brief, barely noticeable drifts of attention away from the meditation object.

name: Sensory Stimulation
description: Instability caused by sensory fields pulling attention away from whole-body awareness.

name: Anticipation of Pleasure
description: Excitement or craving toward pleasant meditative experiences, disrupting sustained awareness.

name: Fear of Letting Go
description: Resistance to deep letting go due to fear, preventing access concentration.

name: Doubt
description: Doubt present at any stage of mindfulness of breathing until Stream Entry.
